name: osu-recommender
description: osu! Beatmap Recommender System - Full-stack ETL pipeline and web application

scripts.test:all: npm run test:python && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.pipeline:full: npm run etl:full && npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.setup: pip install pyarrow duckdb pytest pytest-cov requests && cd server && npm install && cd ../app && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf server/dist app/dist && echo "NOTE: we did not clear the follow dirs: data/ingest/2026-02/bronze_parquet  data/warehouse/2026-02"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && rm -rf venv server/node_modules app/node_modules
